events.title: We Meet
events.description: We met by chance at a coffee shop on a rainy afternoon—she was reading her favorite book, and I offered her the last available seat. What began as casual conversation quickly turned into hours of laughter, shared dreams, and a spark neither of them expected.

events.title: The First Date
events.description: Over time, their bond deepened—built on mutual respect, love for travel, late-night talks, and endless support through life's ups and downs. From spontaneous road trips to quiet evenings at home, they discovered that their happiest moments were simply being together.

events.title: The Proposal
events.description: Years later, Wilson proposed at the very coffee shop where it all began, and Amanda said yes without hesitation. Today, surrounded by loved ones, they celebrate the beginning of a forever that feels like it was always meant to be.
